    Dictionary Calculations

Local Coverage Determinations

Source: R/lcd_ncd.R
lcd.Rd

Database Last Updated 2023-04-27

Usage

lcd(hcpcs = NULL, ...)

Arguments

hcpcs

vector of HCPCS codes

...

Empty

Value

a tibble

Examples

lcd(hcpcs = c("A4555", "E0766"))
#> # A tibble: 2 × 84
#>   lcd_id lcd_version hcpc_code_id hcpc_code_version hcpc_code_group range
#>   <chr>  <chr>       <chr>        <chr>             <chr>           <chr>
#> 1 34823  27          A4555        75                1               N    
#> 2 34823  27          E0766        75                1               N    
#> # ℹ 78 more variables: last_updated <dttm>, long_description <chr>,
#> #   short_description <chr>, paragraph <chr>, title <chr>,
#> #   determination_number <lgl>, orig_det_eff_date <dttm>,
#> #   ent_det_end_date <dttm>, rev_eff_date <dttm>, rev_end_date <dttm>,
#> #   indication <chr>, diagnoses_support <lgl>, icd9_dont_support_para <lgl>,
#> #   icd9_dont_support_ast <lgl>, diagnoses_dont_support <lgl>,
#> #   coding_guidelines <lgl>, doc_reqs <lgl>, appendices <lgl>, …
